column4: Im a Ubuntu edgy eft user, I have a really stable system now, is there any real reason to dist-upgrade?
if you are happy you don't need to upgrade
but am I missing out of ant "fiesty fun"?

there isnt, much fun in feisty , the only things that are realy different if your system works on edgy is compiz pre installed and  automaticaly loading codecs, if you already have those in edgy you'Re fine
